articles.author: Jenny McGrath
articles.title: Multiple sclerosis susceptibility linked through ancient DNA study - Business Insider
articles.description: Researchers studying ancient DNA linked genetic susceptibility to multiple sclerosis with Yamnaya herders who arrived in Europe about 5,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Genes that may have once helped ancient herders fight infectious parasites could contribute to autoimmune diseases today, like multiple sclerosis.
Multiple sclerosis
 is a progressive disease that … [+3387 chars]
